title: What do I tell my children?
creator_credit: Leslie Bellis Kussmann and Aquarius Productions
brief_description: This video is internationally recognised as the most outstanding available for families and professionals who are dealing with children and grief issues, Children and parents share their stories and feelings about the loss of a loved one, while leading professionals in the field - including Earl Grollman, Elsiabeth Kubler-Ross, Sandra Fox and Anne Kilman - offer advice about coping and grief. It looks at practical advice for dealing with different kinds of bereavement: sibling, parent and grandparent.
